summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Sewer Utility, to revise sewer rates and charges; adopting Section 21.28.040 (Section 4 of Ordinance 84390); amending Sections 21.28.030, 21.28.060 through 21.28.080, 21.28.200, 21.28.220 and 21.28.240 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Sections 3, 4.1, 4.2, 4.3, 5, 5.2 and 5.4 of Ordinance 84390); and, repealing Sections 21.28.050, 21.28.090 through 21.28.190 and 21.28.210 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Sections 4.A, 4.4 through 4.14 and 5.1 of Ordinance 84390).
